name: Math Puzzle Legend
description:
Puzzle math is a whole new type of puzzling fun. Find the same number in colorful circles and combine them to grow up.

If you get bombs (or special bombs), tap on them then drag a line across the match horizontally, vertically or diagonaly to clear numbers off the screen

Match 3 or more bombs together to get a special bomb

Game Features:
- Easy to play, hard to master.
- Increasing numbers puzzle gameplay: it’s a whole new type of puzzling fun.
- Don't worry! It has simple rules and Easy to control. No time limits!
- Auto save game progress
- Online ranking system
- Smoothy effect
- Offer Free Hearts in many ways (Invited friend, Video Watching, Daily Bonus)
- FREE Update!

If you face any technical issue on your device, appreciate if you can contact us prior to writing negative review. We will try to address the issue as soon as possible. Thanks and have fun !
